title: NYC Plans to Stop Homeless People From Sheltering on Subways - The New York Times
content:
1. NYC Plans to Stop Homeless People From Sheltering on Subways  The New York Times
  2. Homeless advocates voice opposition to Mayor Eric Adams' aggressive subway safety plan  CBS New York
  3. NYC Mayor Eric Adams subway safety plans calls for outreach workers, including school nurses  Fox News
  4. BP Levine continues to probe MTA on track safety amid more subway deaths | amNewYork  AMNY
  5. Mayor, governor unveil plan to help homelessness on NYC subways  Eyewitness News ABC7NY
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The plan calls for stricter enforcement of transit system rules and more mental-health services and housing options for those being cleared from stations and trains.
